channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Tesla is fighting the EV sales slump with short-term rentals
item.description: Tesla is now in the business of short-term car rentals, as the company tries to mitigate falling sales in the US following the expiry of federal tax credits for electric vehicles. Rentals are currently being offered in two California Tesla stores in San Diego and Costa Mesa, with plans to expand to more locations by […]

item.title: Why a lot of people are getting hacked with government spyware
item.description: Government surveillance vendors want us to believe their spyware products are only used in limited and targeted operations against terrorists and serious criminals. That claim is increasingly difficult to justify, given the broad range of victims — journalists, activists, and now political consultants — that have come forward.

item.title: Microsoft paie des influenceurs mode pour essayer de rendre Copilot « cool »
item.description: Microsoft a un problème avec Copilot. Le bot IA de l'éditeur est en effet très loin d'être aussi populaire que ChatGPT, dont il reprend pourtant les mêmes technologies. L'entreprise a donc décidé d'embaucher des influenceurs pour vendre l'idée que Copilot était « cool ».

item.title: Darty enflamme le pré-Black Friday avec -53 % sur ce TV Samsung OLED 144 Hz de 55 pouces lancé en 2025
item.description: Quand il est sorti, le Samsung 55S90F était à 1 799 euros, mais pendant le pré-Black Friday avec réductions et ODR sur Darty, il revient à 829 euros.

item.title: Apple could be working on a batch of new iPhone satellite features, and I'm cautious but optimistic
item.description: Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman has suggested that Apple could be working on developing the iPhone’s satellite capability.

item.title: Flight delays and cancellations just hit more than 13,000 in one day with FAA mandate in effect. Will it get worse?
item.description: A plan to potentially reopen the government is working its way through Congress. In the meantime, travelers should expect even tighter restrictions. This weekend, U.S. travelers began to feel the initial impact of flight reductions mandated by the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA), a plan designed to help compensate for the understaffing of air traffic controllers due to the ongoing government shutdown. ...

item.title: Samsung au CES 2026 : la LPDDR6 est officielle, un SSD modulaire pour les voitures et un T7 recyclé
item.description: Samsung au CES 2026 : LPDDR6, AutoSSD modulaire et greenwashing ? Voici les quatre annonces qui concernent le stockage et la mémoire.

item.title: Brands Mean Business
item.description: Four reasons you shouldn’t be surprised that brands are still strategic assets. Brands matter now more than ever.

item.title: Apple TV 4K : tvOS 26.2 simplifie les profils et le contrôle parental
item.description: Avec sa mise à jour 26.2, Apple propose de nouvelles fonctionnalités sur son boîtier multimédia l’Apple TV 4K, pour une personnalisation plus poussée et une sécurité accrue pour tous les membres du foyer.

item.title: Buying an older version is the best way to save on a Dyson haircare gadget this deals season – and I'm already seeing major discounts
item.description: Thinking about opting for a Dyson Supersonic or Airwrap Origin to save money this Black Friday? Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Microsoft is working on a "new class” of AI agents that could change everything in your workforce
item.description: Hybrid work has become synonymous with remote working. But what if it meant humans working with AI?

item.title: Jennifer Lawrence Keeps Teasing the Mystery New Miss Piggy Movie
item.description: Plus, Dave Bautista talks about the delayed behind the 'Highlander' reboot.

item.title: Asus ProArt P16 Review: The Fastest Windows Laptop
item.description: This just might be the fastest Windows laptops on the market. Don’t ask about the price.

item.title: 6Sense founder Amanda Kahlow raises $30 million for new human-replacement AI sales startup 1Mind
item.description: Amanda Kahlow has been quietly been back in sales and marketing tech for about a year with agentic startup 1Mind.

item.title: Scribe hits $1.3B valuation as it moves to show where AI will actually pay off
item.description: Scribe Optimize is the startup's next major offering to help organizations identify where AI will be most useful.

item.title: ‘Magnets are too heavy’: OnePlus exec explains why the OnePlus 15 doesn’t have Pixel-style magnetic charging
item.description: At a roundtable interview attended by TechRadar, OnePlus exec Rudolf Xu explained the thought process behind the OnePlus 15's charging system.

item.title: Europe’s largest motoring club tested how much range one popular EV lost over 4 years and almost 110,000 miles – and it’s way less than you’d think
item.description: Extensive tests showed the Volkswagen ID 3 retained well in excess of 90% battery capacity after four years of hard driving.

item.title: I write about AI for a living – and I can’t see Pluribus as anything but a scathing examination of our relationship with it
item.description: Pluribus doesn't mention AI at all, but to me it’s a chilling examination of our relationship with today’s chatbots and how they’re changing the world around us.

item.title: Pré-Black Friday : les meilleurs deals Fnac et Darty à ne pas manquer
item.description: La Fnac et Darty n’entendent pas laisser Boulanger et Amazon occuper le terrain : les deux enseignes soeurs dégainent elles aussi leurs promotions avant le Black Friday. Ordinateurs, smartphones, TV, tablettes… les bonnes affaires se multiplient, et nous avons sélectionné pour vous les offres les plus intéressantes.

item.title: L’iPhone 18 devrait être compatible avec la 5G NTN, mais c’est quoi cette nouvelle 5G ?
item.description: Apple préparerait l'iPhone 18 pour la 5G NTN, cette technologie qui permet de se connecter directement aux satellites. Mais la 5G NTN, c'est quoi exactement ?

item.title: Apple Health chatbot could be the AI feature you've been waiting for, but will it really be worth a subscription?
item.description: Apple is reportedly working on an AI chatbot for its upcoming Health+ subscription service, and it better be worth it.

item.title: The latest five-star Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds are down to an all-time low price at Amazon
item.description: The brand-new Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds are the ultimate earbuds for many, and they've hit their lowest price ever for Black Friday

item.title: Metro's latest iPhone 17 Pro deal saves you $300 without the pricey unlimited plan
item.description: Want an iPhone 17 Pro but don't want to spend big on your plan? Metro's latest deal offers a significant discount for new customers.

item.title: Forget Netflix and Prime Video, Channel 4 has the best TV binge of the week, and you can stream the full series now
item.description: Trespasses is the brand-new binge now available on Channel 4, but be prepared to have your heart broken.

item.title: Blue Origin scrubs second New Glenn launch
item.description: The second launch of Blue Origin’s partially reusable New Glenn rocket was scrubbed on Sunday due to adverse weather conditions, delaying NASA’s latest Mars mission. The Jeff Bezos-owned commercial space company announced that its next launch window from Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Florida will be attempted “no earlier” than Wednesday, November 12th, between […]...

item.title: Major privacy laws - including GDPR - could be downgraded to try and boost AI growth and cut red tape
item.description: A ‘digital omnibus’ package could enhance the EU’s position as an AI leader - but at the cost of privacy.

item.title: How national security swallowed the Earth observation industry
item.description: Turmoil on Earth is remaking the business of watching it from above, as geopolitical conflict has the sector taking a page from Palantir, blending satellite images with AI and other data to deliver near-real time intelligence. If you’ve seen a bird’s-eye view of Earth over the past decade, chances are it came from Colorado-based Maxar Intelligence. From some 280 miles up, its powerful imaging satellites have created an atlas of modern problems: the impacts of extreme weather, the build-up of Russian tanks near the Ukrainian border, the ruination of Khartoum and the decimation of Gaza, even the...

item.title: Le prix de l’excellente Suunto Race S, notée 9/10, baisse de près de 100 € pour le pré-Black Friday
item.description: Petite sœur de la Suunto Race, la montre connectée Suunto Race S est plus légère, plus fine et même plus fluide que son aînée. Elle est surtout affichée à un prix bien plus intéressant. Et c'est encore plus le cas pendant le pré-Black Friday : Amazon la propose à 259,95 euros au lieu de 349 euros.

item.title: Spotify could finally be about to roll out this much-loved Apple Music feature – but not for everyone
item.description: Is Spotify finally rolling out lyric translations? This Reddit user seems to think so.

item.title: Lenskart recovers from tepid open to close first day slightly above IPO price
item.description: Lenskart's public listing stirred debate over the nearly $8 billion valuation set in its IPO.

item.title: ‘Predator: Badlands’ Scores a Franchise-Best Box Office Open
item.description: The first weekend of November belonged to 'Predator: Badlands' and its much better than expected theatrical debut.

item.title: How C.H. Robinson’s CEO acquired his customer obsession
item.description: Stints at Harley-Davidson, Caterpillar, Amazon, and Ford instilled in C.H. Robinson CEO Dave Bozeman a deep sense of customer-centricity. Hello and welcome to Modern CEO! I’m Stephanie Mehta, CEO and chief content officer of Mansueto Ventures. Each week this newsletter explores inclusive approaches to leadership drawn from conversations with executives and entrepreneurs, and from the pages of Inc. and Fast Company. If you received this newsletter from a friend, you can sign up to get it yourself every Monday morning....

item.title: John Oliver reacts to Zohran Mamdanis New York mayor election win
item.description: John Oliver has responded to Zohran Mamdani winning the New York mayoral race during the latest episode of "Last Week Tonight".

item.title: Industrial computing systems at risk from "time bombs " in malicious NuGet packages
item.description: Researchers found malicious packages on NuGet designed to sabotage processes in two years.

item.title: Agentic AI: four ways it's delivering on business expectations
item.description: Agentic AI turns insights into execution, driving measurable ROI where generative tools fall short.

item.title: 7 ways to reduce stress at work—using the science of behavioral therapy
item.description: The same skills that help people navigate crises and build healthier relationships can help you stay centered in a difficult meeting and recover from professional setbacks with greater resilience. At its best, work can be energizing, creative, and meaningful. It can also be emotionally exhausting and stressful. Even in healthy organizations, we all deal with interpersonal tension, stinging feedback, impossible deadlines, and the constant pressure to perform. Add in the rapid pace of change and a steady diet of uncertainty, and it’s no wonder many of us feel perpetually on edge....

item.title: How to watch the 2025-26 Ashes online for free
item.description: How to watch The Ashes for free. Live stream the 2025-26 Ashes series for free from anywhere in the world.
